title: Madhya Pradesh adds 4,882 COVID-19 cases to tally, 23 casualties
description: The state also recorded 23 deaths due to the virus in the last 24 hours that raised the toll to 4,136, an official said.Three are 6,921 active cases in Indore at present, while Bhopal has 5,011 such cases, he said

title: Coronavirus Lockdown India Live News: Delhi reports steep 1-day hike with over 8,000 new cases; Kejriwal shuts down schools
description: Coronavirus India Lockdown Live, Covid-19 Cases in India, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Delhi Night Curfew Live Updates: As India stares at another health crisis, Prime Minister Narendra Modi yesterday held a meeting with chief ministers/administrators of states/UTs. He stressed on creation of micro-containment zones, asked CMs to focus on test and trace

title: Centre, states step in to stop hoarding of Remdesivir as COVID cases rise - The Federal
description: Hoarding of anti-viral drug Remdesivir, first reported in Mumbai, has quickly spread to several cities in western, central, northern and eastern parts of the country, forcing the Union Government and state governments to swing into action.

title: In pics: These states have imposed night curfew, weekend lockdowns as COVID-19 cases rise
description: The sudden spike in cases forced many state governments and district administrations to impose restrictions to contain the spread of the virus. Here is a list of states, cities that have enforced fresh curbs.Get latest Healthcare online at cnbctv18.com

title: 118-Year Old Woman From Madhya Pradesh Becomes The Oldest Woman To Get COVID-19 Vaccine - ZEE5 News
description: Tulsabai, possibly the oldest in the world who has received a Covid-19 shot. She claims that there are no side effects and also urges people to take the shot.

title: These states have announced weekend lockdown from today amid Covid-19 spike
description: The Maharashtra govt has made additional restrictions announcing weekend lockdown and night curfew in the city amid huge Covid surge.The Madhya Pradesh government has enforced a similar lockdown in all cities of the state from 6 pm on Friday to 6 am on Monday

title: Covid-19: Delhi govt, private schools shut till further notice
description: The blanket closure of school announcement comes a week after the state education department had said that secondary and senior secondary students may continue to come to schools for certain guidance and exam.In Delhi, the fresh cases on 8 April were almost 7500

title: COVID-19: 11-Day Yagna To Check Covid Begins At Ujjain Temple
description: An 11-day yagna or payers around a holy fire, against the raging COVID-19 pandemic, began at the famous Mahakaleshwar Temple at Ujjain in Madhya Pradesh on Friday morning. The temple is dedicated to Lord Shiva.

title: Coronavirus in India: Is it mandatory to carry COVID-19 negative report while travelling by train?
Madhya Pradesh: Vaccines allotted for Sailana taken back to district headquarters, no vaccination now
description: From April 8, vaccination has been stopped in Sailana and nearby tribal areas. On April 7, 100 people were vaccinated and then it was announced that there would be no vaccination for the next 3-4 days.

title: 'He Has Covid, I Don't': Ambulance With Patient Stops At Juice Shop
description: A health worker dressed in PPE kit waits for his order of juice after stopping an ambulance carrying a Covid patient at a shop, in a shocking video that has emerged from Madhya Pradesh.

title: You may have got COVID-19, check if you had these symptoms in past
description: The researchers have introduced a new list of symptoms to the list. The usual symptoms of COVID-19 include fever, body ache, loss of smell and taste, chills, breathlessness. Several studies are suggesting that pink eyes, gastronomical conditions, and hearing impairment should not be taken lightly.

title: LIVE News Updates: Fire breaks out at a building in Indore, 5 rescued
description: Madhya Pradesh: Fire breaks out at a building in Indore. We have rescued 5 people from the building. The fire broke out near the air conditioner, say police

title: Coronavirus India Highlights: PM Modi asks CMs to focus on micro-containment
description: PM Modi, who chaired a meet with the state chief ministers in the wake of surge in coronavirus cases, said of late, both the people and state administration are exhibiting casual approach towards the virus.

title: 11-day 'yagna' to 'cast out' COVID-19 begins at Madhya Pradesh temple
description: Seventy-seven Hindu priests took part in the yagna

title: 60-hour weekend lockdown in all Madhya Pradesh cities: CM Chouhan
description: A lockdown will be enforced in all cities of Madhya Pradesh from 6 pm on Friday to 6 am on Monday  to check the spread of the coronavirus infection, Chief  Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan said

title: Highlights: No oxygen supply crisis in Madhya Pradesh, says CM Chouhan

From The Newsroom: Madhya Pradesh announces weekend lockdown; French Open postponed by a week
description: In your evening news brief, Madhya Pradesh has announced a weekend lockdown; Karnataka Chief Minister B S Yediyurappa will hold a meeting with the officials concerned regarding the ongoing strike of Road Transport Corporation workers; French Open has been postponed by a week and Shiv Sena MP Sanjay Raut claims "dirty politics" was being played out to destabilise the Maha Vikas Aghadi government.

title: 87-year-old man gets vaccinated in Madhya Pradesh, urges others to do so
description: Prashant Sedhia, the centre’s cold chain manager, said nurse Brijeshwari Dubey administered the dose to Khete Patel. He added Patel’s Aadhaar card declared his year of birth as 1898, which shows him to be 122

title: 60-hour Weekend Lockdown In All Madhya Pradesh Cities, Says CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan
description: Talking to reporters after chairing a meeting to review the COVID-19 situation in MP, Shivraj Singh Chouhan said his government aims to increase the number of beds for COVID-19 patients in the state to one lakh.

title: COVID-19: Now, night curfew in urban areas, MP govt offices to work for five days every week
description: Madhya Pradesh has also announced a lockdown in urban areas of all districts every Sunday and a lockdown in the entire Chhindwara district for the next seven days.

title: Coronavirus India updates: Madhya Pradesh govt announces night curfew in urban areas

title: Madhya Pradesh To Procure Remdesivir Injections For Poor Covid Patients

description: The students of Madhya Pradesh need to know something important! Due to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, the Madhya Pradesh government has decided to provide the option to the students of classes 9 to 12 to choose the mode of exam.

title: COVID-19: Madhya Pradesh suspends bus operations with Chhattisgarh till April 15
description: On Sunday, MP Chief Minister Shivraj Singh said the state government will restrict the movement of people from Chhattisgarh to curb the spread of COVID-19.

title: 2 Madhya Pradesh cops thrash man for not wearing mask in public, suspended
description: Two Madhya Pradesh policemen were suspended after they allegedly thrashed a man for not wearing a face mask in public. The incident took place in Indore.

title: 118-year-old Madhya Pradesh woman vaccinated against Covid-19 shows no side-effects: Officials
description: Tulsabai, possibly the oldest in the world to receive a Covid-19 shot, has not shown any side effects from the vaccine dosage so far, officials told news agency ANI.

title: Cops make violators watch COVID-19 awareness movie in Madhya Pradesh
description: Those who violated the lockdown were made to take an oath about following COVID-19 restrictions in Madhya Pradesh's Betul.

title: Covid-19: Madhya Pradesh to limit movement of people from Chhattisgarh
description: Madhya Pradesh chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan said that to curb the spread of Covid-19, movement of people from Chhattisgarh will be restricted. Only those who need to come for "necessary and unavoidable work" will be allowed.

title: Madhya Pradesh: Barwani seals border with Maharashtra to check COVID-19 spread
description: Authorities in Barwani have decided to seal the Madhya Pradesh district’s border with neighbouring Maharashtra to check the spread of coronavirus infection, an official said on Monday

title: MP registers 2,777 new Covid cases, 16 deaths in one day
description: Around 1,482 people have either been cured or discharged from health facilities in one day

title: Madhya Pradesh contributes to country’s 81,466 new Covid cases, 469 deaths
description: The country has been recording a spike in cases for over three weeks. Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, Punjab, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat are logging steep rise in daily new cases.

title: 2 days of lockdown imposed in 3 MP districts amid Covid-19 surge
description: Earlier, the state government had imposed Sunday Lockdown in 12 districts including these four amid a spike in Covid-19 cases.

title: MP Minister Govind Singh Rajput tests positive for COVID-19 | Headlines
description: Madhya Pradesh Minister for Revenue and Transport Govind Singh Rajput has tested positive for COVID-19.

title: Educational institutes in 7 districts of MP closed till April 15 amid Covid
description: Madhya Pradesh ordered all schools and colleges in Bhopal, Indore, Jabalpur, Betul, Chhindwara, Khargone, Ratlamcities to remain closed till April 15, in view of rising Covid-19 cases in the state

title: 3-day lockdown imposed in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara as Covid cases rise
description: ​A three-day lockdown has been imposed in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara as it reported a rise in coronavirus cases. The decision was taken by the district administration at an emergency meeting.

title: Madhya Pradesh: No Lockdown in State For Now, Ban on Bus Operations With Maharashtra Extended Till April 30
description: Shivraj Singh Chouhan-led Madhya Pradesh government has shut all schools in the state for students up to class 8 till April 15 amid a spike in COVID-19 cases.

title: Madhya Pradesh reports 2,332 new COVID-19 infections, active cases top 17,000
description: The state government on Wednesday extended the suspension of passenger bus operations with Maharashtra till April 15.On Tuesday, it also decided to keep all schools in the state up to class VIII shut till April 15
